name: Hellfire Rapier
I0D: This weapon is fashioned from infernal iron and traced with veins of hellfire that shed dim light in a 5-foot-radius.
I1D: Any humanoid killed by an attack made with this weapon has its soul funneled into the River Styx, where it's reborn instantly as a lemure devil.
I2D: When making an attack with a finesse weapon, you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.
